import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar = () => { const [isProfileMenuOpen, setIsProfileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const toggleProfileMenu = () => { setIsProfileMenuOpen(!isProfileMenuOpen); }; const handleSearchChange = (event) => { setSearchQuery(event.target.value); }; const handleSearchSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Handle search functionality here console.log('Search Query:', searchQuery); }; return (
